name: part_000
file: tmp_hololive production x DreamHack Melbourne 2024： Down Under [Free Preview] [IQqAbuGvDHM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: A pre-show informational loop displayed before the concert begins. It features a guide for member penlight colors, photosensitivity warnings, and rules regarding screenshots and recordings. The visuals are accompanied by upbeat background music and repeat in a continuous cycle.

subtitles.original: PENLIGHT COLOURS
subtitles.english: PENLIGHT COLOURS

subtitles.original: CONCERT STARTING SOON
subtitles.english: CONCERT STARTING SOON

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The performance will begin soon. Please wait a moment.

subtitles.original: PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING
subtitles.english: PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Due to the production, please be mindful of flashing lights.

subtitles.original:
YOU ARE FREE TO TAKE SCREENSHOTS.
SCREEN RECORDINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED.
subtitles.english:
YOU ARE FREE TO TAKE SCREENSHOTS.
SCREEN RECORDINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED.

subtitles.original:
スクリーンショットをSNSにアップロード投稿OKです
録音、録画、ミラー配信や違法アップロードは固く禁止いたします
subtitles.english:
Screenshots may be posted to social media.
Recording and illegal uploads are strictly prohibited.
